name: UFO Flight
description:
---Info---

Game made in three days for the ZenoJam, following the theme "I Am Everywhere". Ran out of time to add a damage indicator to enemies but they can be destroyed.

You are an alien visiting a rouge planet when suddenly you are attacked! Bullets are flying everywhere around you, but you can move freely anywhere. You have no collision as you phase through your enemies and even the ground.

---Controls---

AWSD: Move

Space: Shoot down

Enter: Pause game

LMB: Buy upgrades while game is paused
